networks.Impedence.Impedence¶

class networks.Impedence.Impedence(name, from_bus_id, to_bus_id, r_pu, x_pu, kv, kvar)¶

Bases: Element

A class representing an impedance element in a power system network.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the impedance element.

  • from_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “from” bus of the impedance element.

  • to_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “to” bus of the impedance element.

  • r_pu (float) – The per unit resistance of the impedance.

  • x_pu (float) – The per unit reactance of the impedance.

  • kv (float) – The voltage magnitude associated with the impedance in kilovolts (kV).

  • kvar (float) – The apparent power rating of the impedance in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

__init__(name, from_bus_id, to_bus_id, r_pu, x_pu, kv, kvar)¶

Initializes an Impedence object.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the impedance element.

  • from_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “from” bus of the impedance element.

  • to_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “to” bus of the impedance element.

  • r_pu (float) – The per unit resistance of the impedance.

  • x_pu (float) – The per unit reactance of the impedance.

  • kv (float) – The voltage magnitude associated with the impedance in kilovolts (kV).

  • kvar (float) – The apparent power rating of the impedance in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).
